sentences.english: When putt in place, the block stones shall be bigger-face up with joints staggered.
sentences.chinese: 擺放塊石時，石料應大面向上，縫隙相互錯開。

sentences.english: In this article the electromagnetic scattering characteristics of serrate gaps common in aircraft surfaces are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對飛行器表面常見鋸齒縫隙的散射特性進行了研究。

sentences.english: Li Busu was familiar with the route so they made rapid progress. He turned this way and that through open crevices .
sentences.chinese: 李不俗駕輕就熟，在那些嵌裂透漏的縫隙中鑽來轉去。

sentences.english: Gaps on the heart line suggest the person has known heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 情感線上的縫隙暗示這個人曾有過的傷心事。

sentences.english: Sunlight filtered through the chinks of the shutters.
sentences.chinese: 陽光從百葉窗的縫隙中透過來。

sentences.english: So if you have sort of any cracks or crevices, just use caulk and that sort of thing.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果你房子裏有什麼縫隙，就用東西塞嚴。

sentences.english: Construct walls that are washable and leak-proof or sealed at the edges with no crevices.
sentences.chinese: 建造可洗和密封或者在邊緣處沒有縫隙的牆。

sentences.english: This paper presents a strict analysis of the axial conformal slot-array on a metallic cylindrically-tipped wedge.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種嚴格分析圓楔體軸向共形縫隙陣的方法。

sentences.english: It was also found thatthere are plaques without closely packed polyg…
sentences.chinese: 同時也觀察到在較大的縫隙連接中有空斑存在。

sentences.english: Then using the principles, we analyse the mutual conductances between elements on cylindrical slot conformal array antennas.
sentences.chinese: 分析了圓柱縫隙共形陣天線單元間的互導納。

sentences.english: The man peeped in through a crack.
sentences.chinese: 那個人透過縫隙向裏偷看。

sentences.english: Life can be found in almost every nook and cranny of our planet Earth.
sentences.chinese: 在地球的每一角落和縫隙幾乎都存在生命。

sentences.english: It saturates the atmosphere, covers the Earth's surface and wheedles its way into bedrock cracks.
sentences.chinese: 它充塞大氣，覆蓋地表，還巧妙地進入了石牀的縫隙。

sentences.english: A small crack might let in some wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 一個小縫隙也許會讓些智慧流進來。

sentences.english: Between skull's bone seam I has two big spot slits in the baby top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 顱骨之間的骨縫在寶寶頭頂I有兩個大一點的縫隙。

sentences.english: By sealing these leaks you can save on your heating bill.
sentences.chinese: 塞緊這些縫隙，可以省不少取暖費。

definition: car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
